alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Mitchell, southwestern Jewell and northeastern Osborne Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 345 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cawker City, or 19 miles west of Beloit, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Downs and Cawker City around 400 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
